mapper.select: select sheep.id, sheep.device_id, sheep.sheep_nickname, sheep.gender, sheep.sheep_img, sheep.sheep_status, sheep.birth_day, sheep.sheep_breeds_id, device_info.device_longitude, device_info.device_latitude, device_info.accuracy, device_info.create_time, users.nickname from st_sheep sheep left join ( select info.device_id as info_device_id, info.device_longitude, info.device_latitude, info.accuracy, info.create_time from st_device_info info group by device_id order by info.create_time desc ) as device_info on device_info.info_device_id=sheep.device_id LEFT JOIN st_users users ON users.id = sheep.user_id where sheep.user_id is null and device_id is not null and sheep.sheep_status = 0 order by sheep.birth_day desc limit #{offset},#{limit}
